channel.title: Homes on Dan Han
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Dan Han

item.description: I am a postdoc fellow at the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health. I study health care policy issues in both the US and non-US settings. My current research is focused on the behaviors of health care providers in the context of maternal and newborn care. Research interest Health care payment policies Provider behaviors and decision making Prescription drug policies Education PhD in Policy Analysis, Pardee RAND Graduate School, 2019 MPA in Health Policy, New York University, 2012 BSc in Preventive Medicine, Sun Yat-sen University, 2009

item.title: Contact
